interdroid.swan.sensors

Interface SensorInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCuckooSensor, AbstractSensorBase, AbstractSwanSensor, BatterySensor, BluetoothSensor, CalendarSensor, CallSensor, GyroscopeSensor, IntentSensor, LightSensor, LocationSensor, LogCatSensor, MagnetometerSensor, MovementSensor, PolarHeartRate, PressureSensor, ProximitySensor, ScreenSensor, SignalStrengthSensor, SmartLocationSensor, SoundSensor, StepCounterSensor, StepDetectorSensor, TemperatureSensor, TwitterSensor, WifiSensor

    public interface SensorInterface
    This is the interface that sensors which make use of the AbstractSensorBase or one of its subclasses must implement.
    Author:
    nick <palmer@cs.vu.nl>

            java.lang.String valuePath,
            android.os.Bundle configuration)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Handle registering an expression.
        Parameters:
        id - the expression to register
        valuePath - the value path being registered
        configuration - the configuration for the expression
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the sensor
